They are needed when you start the IPWIZARD and when you create a VSWITCH for the Linux VMs. Table 2-9 z/VM and networking resources Name Value Comment TCP/IP user ID TCPIP TCPIP is recommended. z/VM host name, member 1 RDBKZVMG z/VM host name, member 2 RDBKZVMH TCP/IP domain name cpolab.ibm.com System domain name is usually set in DNS.
